description: This attractive stir-fry is inspired by a traditional Chinese dish called rainbow beef The vegetarian version works well, and it’s also easier to make If you prefer a very firm tofu, take the extra time to weight it as directed in step 1
title: Stir-Fried Tofu and Peppers
title_page: Stir-Fried Tofu and Peppers Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This attractive stir-fry is inspired by a traditional Chinese dish called rainbow beef. The vegetarian version works well, and it’s also easier to make. If you prefer a very firm tofu, take the extra time to weight it as directed in step 1. I am happy to skip this step and use firm tofu that hasn’t been weighted.
Featured in: Late Summer Stir Fries.
